maven_registry.description: Url of the maven registry that the package should be published to.
maven_registry.title: Maven Registry

password.description: Password (token) to access the maven registry.It is recommended to set this via the environment variable `PACKAGE__AAR__PUBLISH__PASSWORD`

profiles.description: The base directory where the target profiles are located
profiles.title: Profiles

ConanConfigModel.title: ConanConfigModel

out.description: The output folder for the generated files. Separate folders for `source` and `header` files can be specified.
out.title: Out

namespace.description: The namespace name to use for generated C++/CLI classes
namespace.title: Namespace

include_cpp_prefix.description: The prefix for `#includes` of header files from C++ files
include_cpp_prefix.title: Include Cpp Prefix

nullability_attributes.description: Whether diagnostics nullability attributes should be added to methods, functions and fields (Not available in .NET Framework)
nullability_attributes.title: Nullability Attributes

string_serialization.description: Whether to generate `ToString` overloads for records
string_serialization.title: String Serialization

out.description: The output folder for the generated files. Separate folders for `source` and `header` files can be specified.
out.title: Out

namespace.description: The namespace name to use for generated C++ classes
namespace.title: Namespace

include_prefix.description: The prefix for `#includes` of header files from C++ files
include_prefix.title: Include Prefix

header_extension.description: The filename extension for C++ header files
header_extension.title: Header Extension

source_extension.description: The filename extension for C++ files
source_extension.title: Source Extension

string_serialization.description: Whether to generate `to_string` and `std::formatter` overloads for stringifying records, enums and flags
string_serialization.title: String Serialization

CppNotNull.description: Configuration for wrapping `std::shared_ptr` and `function`s with a `not_null` type.

header.description: The header file to include for not_null (e.g. `<gsl/pointers>`)
header.title: Header

type.description: The type to use for not_null (e.g. `::gsl::not_null`)
type.title: Type

CppNotNull.title: CppNotNull

list_processed_files.description: File that reports all the parsed and generated files. File format is determined by the file extension. Supported extensions: `.yaml`, `.yml`, `.json`, `.toml`
list_processed_files.title: List Processed Files

include_dirs.description: Include directories that are searched for `@import` and `@extern` directives.
include_dirs.title: Include Dirs

default_deriving.description: Deriving functionality that should be added to every record by default.
default_deriving.title: Default Deriving

support_lib_sources.description: Whether the required support lib sources should be copied to the generated output.
support_lib_sources.title: Support Lib Sources

prefix.description: Prefix that is added to the beginning of the identifier
prefix.title: Prefix

out.description: The output folder for the generated files.
out.title: Out

package.description: The package name to use for generated Java classes
package.title: Package

support_types_package.description: The subpackage name where required support types are generated to
support_types_package.title: Support Types Package

interfaces.description: Whether Java interfaces should be used instead of abstract classes where possible
interfaces.title: Interfaces

class_access_modifier.description: The access modifier to use for generated Java classes

cpp_exception.description: The type for translated C++ exceptions in Java
cpp_exception.title: Cpp Exception

annotation.description: Java annotation to place on all generated Java classes
annotation.title: Annotation

nullable_annotation.description: annotation that is added to all optional fields, parameters and return types. E.g. `@org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable`
nullable_annotation.title: Nullable Annotation

nonnull_annotation.description: annotation that is added to all non-optional fields, parameters and return types. E.g. `@org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull`
nonnull_annotation.title: Nonnull Annotation

use_final_for_record.description: Whether generated Java classes for records should be marked `final`
use_final_for_record.title: Use Final For Record

native_lib.description: Name of the native library containing the JNI interface. If this option is set and an interface is marked as `main`, a static block will be added to the interface, that loads the native library.
native_lib.title: Native Lib

string_serialization.description: Whether to generate `toString` overloads for records
string_serialization.title: String Serialization

out.description: The output folder for the generated files. Separate folders for `source` and `header` files can be specified.
out.title: Out

namespace.title: Namespace

include_prefix.description: The prefix for `#includes` of JNI header files from JNI C++ files.
include_prefix.title: Include Prefix

include_cpp_prefix.description: The prefix for `#includes` of the main header files from JNI C++ files.

header_extension.description: The filename extension for JNI C++ header files

source_extension.description: The filename extension for JNI C++ files
source_extension.title: Source Extension

loader.description: If enabled, a minimal `JNI_OnLoad`/`JNI_OnUnload` implementation is generated.
loader.title: Loader

source.description: NuGet server URL or local folder where the package should be published.
source.title: Source

repository.description: URL to the source Git repository.
repository.title: Repository

readme.description: Path to a Markdown Readme file that should be included in the NuGet package.
readme.title: Readme

net_version.description: .NET version used to compile the binaries. The packaged binaries have to be compiled for the configured .NET version!
net_version.title: Net Version

authors.description: A comma-separated list of packages authors (matching the related profile names on `nuget.org` if published to the public registry)
authors.title: Authors

password.title: Password

out.description: The output folder for the generated files. Separate folders for `source` and `header` files can be specified.

source_extension.description: The filename extension for Objective-C source files.

header_extension.description: The filename extension for Objective-C++ header files

build_strategy.title: Build Strategy

SwiftConfig.description: Configuration options related to using the Objective-C interface from Swift

rename_interfaces.description: Whether the Objective-C interface should be annotated with improved Swift method and class names.
rename_interfaces.title: Rename Interfaces

repository.description: Remote Git repository or path to a local directory where the package should be published
repository.title: Repository

branch.description: Git repository branch that the package should be pushed to.

password.title: Password

YamlConfig.description:
When generating the interface for your project and wish to make it available to other users
you can tell Djinni to generate a special YAML file as part of the code generation process.
This file then contains all the information Djinni requires to include your types in a different project.

out.description: The output folder for YAML files (One for each type by default).
out.title: Out

out_file.description: If specified, all types are merged into a single YAML file instead of generating one file per type (relative to `yaml.out`).
out_file.title: Out File

YamlConfig.title: YamlConfig

platforms.description: Configuration of target platforms that should be included in the package.
Configuration of target platforms that should be included in the package.
Configuration of target platforms that should be included in the package.

generate.description: Configuration options related to language gluecode generation
